p: Poly (vinyl alcohol) (average M w of 130,000; 99.4 % hydrolysis degree), ι-carrageenan (dynamic viscosity of 55 mPa⋅s at 75 °C in 1.5 wt % aqueous solution), κ-carrageenan (dynamic viscosity of 15 mPa⋅s, 0.3% in H 2O at 25 °C), tetracycline hydrochloride (C 22H 25ClN 2O 8, ≥95%, coded with T) amoxicillin (C 16H 19N 3O 5S, potency ≥ 900 μg per mg, coded A), gentamicin sulfate (C 19H 40N 4O 10S, potency: ~600 μg per mg, coded G), and cyclohexane (anhydrous, 99.5%) were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (Darmstadt, Germany) and used without further purification.
